بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
هذا ما اشترت مطرونة ابنت أبنولة من سكّان ططون اشترت من قفرى بن بليط حصّته
من المنزل الّذي يملكه بططون بجميع حدوده ومرافقه ومدخله ومخرجه وسلڤه وسفله وعلوه
ونقضه وبنائه وأبوابه وأفنائه وخشبه وكل حق له في هذا المنزل وحصّته من الدّور الّتي
للدّواب وحصّته من المنزل الّذي بلصق منزل ورثة أبيمة بن ذكري بجميع ما غلقت عليه باب
هذا المنزل والدّار الّذي بلصق هذا المنزل وحصّته من النّخل والسّنط الّذي بينه وبين بمون أخوه
أبو موسى وحصّته من جميع ما كان بينه وبين
مشاع غير مقسوم من المنازل والدّور والسّنط والنّخل والجمّيز وغير ذلك
ممّا خلقه اللّه وبرأه ممّا كان بينه وبين بمون أخوه مشاع غير مقسوم اشترت مطرونة
ابنت أبنولة منه ذلك كلّه بثلثين دينرا عينا ذهبا وقد قبض قفرى بن بليط من مطرونة ابنت
أبنولة هذه الثّلثين دينرا وبرئ من هذه المنازل والدّور والنّخل والسّنط وجميع ما سمّي في هذا الكتاب
حدودها ومرافقها ومصعدها ومدخلها ومخرجها وكل حق لقفرى بن بليط داخل
لمطرونة ابنت أبنولة وصار ذلك مالا من مالها وملك من
مــلكها إن شاپ باعت وإن شاپ عمرت وإن شاپ عطّلت وقد أحازت أحازت مطرونة هذه المنازل
والدّور والسّنط والنّخل المحدود في هذا الكتاب وافترقا عن تراض منهما طائعين غير مكرهين
ولا مجبرين ولم يبق لقفرى بن بليط دعوى ولا طلبة ولا قليل ولا كثير بوجه من الوجوه كلّها والأسباب
وحد حدود هذا المنزل الكبير والدّور حدّهم القبلي الصّحرا والبحري باب المنزل والمدخل والمخرج
والـشّرقي منازل سويرس بن مارمينا والغربي منزل موسيس بن هميسة ودوره وحد حدوده
أبيمة بن ذكري والدّار حدّهم القبلي الصّحرا والبحري منزل بني هيلانة
والــشّرقي منزل ورثة أبيمة بن ذكري والغربي الصّحرا شهد على إقرار قفرى بن بليط بجميع ما في هذا الكتاب
بعد أن قرئ عليه وعرفه وأقر بفهمه في صحّة من عقله وبدنه وجواز أمره غير مططهد
ولا مجبر طالب راغب وذلك في صفر سنة ثمان وستّين ومائتين شهد على ذلك
شهد الحسن بن رزق على إقرار قفرى بن بليط بجميع ما في هذا الكتاب وكتب عنه داود ولده بأمره ومحضره وذلك في صفر سنة ثمان وستّــين
رزق على إقرار قفرى بن بليط بجميع ما في هذا الكتاب وكتب بخطّه في صفر سنة ثمان
إسحق بن سليمن بن رزق على إقرار قفرى بن بليط بجميع ما في هذا الكتاب وكتب في صفر سنة ثمان وستّين ومائتين
شهد طاهر بن الحسن بن رزق بجميع ما في هذا الكتاب وكتب بخطّه وذلك في صفر سنة
شهد هرون بن الحسن بن رزق بجــميع ما في هذا الكتاب وكتب بخطّه وذلك في
صفر سنة ثمان وستّين ومائتين شهد أحمد بن الحسن بن رزق على إقرار قفرى بن بليط
بجميع ما في هذا الكتاب وكتب بخطّه وذلك في صفر سنة ثمان وستّين ومائتين

In the name of God, the merciful and compassionate.
This is, what Maṭrūna bt. ʾAbnūla, of the inhabitants of Ṭuṭūn, has bought. She bought from Qufrà b. Balīṭ his share
of the dwelling which he owns in Ṭuṭūn, with all its boundaries and appurtenances, its entry and exit, its lower and upper part,
and its beams and buildings, doors and fore-courts and its wood, and every right belonging to it in this dwelling, and his share of the houses which
belong to the ?dwʾb?, and his share of the dwelling attached to the dwelling of the heirs of ʾAbīme b. Ḏikrī, with everything which the door of this dwelling
enclose, and the building attached to this dwelling, and his share of the date-palms and the acacia (shared) between him and his brother Bamūn
[...] ʾAbū Mūsà, and (she bought?) his share of everything which he owned together with
[...] hold in common, not divided, of the dwellings, the buildings, the acacia, the date-palms, the sycamores and the everything else
of what God created and brought into being of what was between him and his brother, owned in common and not divided. Maṭrūna bt. ʾAbnūle
bought from him all this for thirty dīnārs, cold coin. Qufrà b. Balīṭ has received from Maṭrūna bt.
ʾAbnūle those thirty dīnārs, and he became free of these dwellings, buildings, date-palms, acacia and sycamores and everything named in this document
<with> their boundaries and appurtenances, their stairs (?), entry and exit and every right belonging to Qufrà b. Balīṭ inside
[...] to Maṭrūna bt. ʾAbnūle, so that this became a property in her property and an estate in
her estate. If she wants, she may sell it, and if she wants, she may inhabit it, and if she wants, she may leave it empty. Maṭruna has taken possession of these dwellings
houses, acacia and date-palms delimited in this document, and they separated in mutual satisfaction, desiring it, not compulsed
nor under coercion. Nothing has remained to Qufrà b. Balīṭ by way of a claim or demand, little or much in any way nor by any reason.
Boundaries delimit this big dwelling and the buildings: Their southern boundary is the desert, the northern one the door of the dwelling, its entry and exit,
the eastern one are the dwellings of Sawīris b. Mārmīnā, and the western one the dwelling of Mūsīs b. Homīse and his buildings. And its boundaries delimit
[? the second object sold, i.e. the dwelling attached to the dwelling of the heirs of ? ] ʾAbīme b. Ḏikrī and the building: Their southern boundary is the desert, the northern one is the dwelling of the sons of Hīlāne,
the eastern one is the dwelling of the heirs of ʾAbīme b. Ḏikrī, and the western one is the desert. The acknowldedgement by Qufrà b. Balīṭ of everything in this document has been witnessed to
after it was read to him, and he took notice of it and acknowledged to have understood it, being in good health of his mind and body and capable of transacting his business, without constraint
nor coercion, desiring and wishing it. This (took place) in Ṣafar of the year two hundred and sixty-eight. This has been testified.
al-Ḥasan b. Rizq witnessed to the acknowledgement by Qufrà b. Balīṭ of everything in this document, and his child Dāwid wrote for him on his order and in his presence. This (took place) in Ṣafar, in the year ... and six[ty]-eight.
[Dāwid b. al-Ḥasan b.? ] Rizq [witnessed] to the acknowledgement by Qufrà b. Balīṭ to everything in this document, and he wrote with his own handwriting in Ṣafar, in ... -eight.
ʾIsḥāq b. Sulaymān b. Rizq [witnessed] to the acknowledgement by Qufrà b. Balīṭ to everything in this document, and he wrote in Ṣafar, in two-hundred and sixty-eight.
Ṭāhir b. al-Ḥasan b. Rizq witnessed to everything in this document, and he wrote in his own handwriting. This (took place) in Ṣafar, year...
Hārūn b. al-Ḥasan b. Rizq witnessed to the acknowledgement by Qufrà b. Balīṭ of ev(erything in) this document, and he wrote in his own handwriting. This (took place) in
Ṣafar, in two-hundred and sixty-eight. ʾA(ḥmad) b. a-Ḥasan b. Rizq witnessed to the acknowledgement by Qufrà b. Balīṭ
of everything in this document, and he wrote in his own handwriting. This (took place) in Ṣafar, in two hundred and sixty-eight.
